details.Bell Timings: The test will be held on Saturday, February 24, 2024 from 11:00 AM to 01:00 PM. The test shall consist of 100 Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ).
details.Instructions: Candidates must bring Admit Card, Blue/Black Ball Pen and any Photo I.D. Proof issued by the Government.
details.Malpractice: Any candidate who is found either copying or receiving or giving assistance will be disqualified.
details.OMR Response Sheet: All questions shall be answered on OMR sheet only.

details.description: Uttar Gujarat Vij Company Limited is seeking candidates to fill up the apprenticeships for BOAT program. The candidates who are interested can apply online through the given link.
details.eligibility_criteria: The candidates must be between 18 and 30 years old, possess a bachelor's degree in any stream, and have a minimum of 60% marks in aggregate.

name: Gujarat Urja Vikas Nigam Limited Recruitment

details.Eligibility Criteria: B.E/B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from a recognized university.
